name: Montero
description: Rudy Willingham's tribute TikTok to Lil Nas X is a hypnotic kaleidoscope of color and sound that caught the attention of millions, including Lil Nas X himself. Each of the 81 frames features Willingham's signature cutouts, photographed against a background that reflects a different part of LNX's genius.
